Brand: Haley's

Category: BB Cream

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Polymethylsilsesquioxane (Spherical Powder), Ethyl Macadamiate, Squalane, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Kaolin, Dimethicone, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Panthenyl Triacetat

Panthenyl Triacetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil. May Contain/ Peut Contenir: Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
